title: My birthday is coming up. Would love to play with a Rioter!
body:
I know I'm not entitled to anything, but I thought I'd try. It would make me SO happy.
Thanks,
Teslablade

replies.body: Ayo! When's your birthday, we can totally play!
Okay, I've got it on my calendar. :D

this is why I love riot , they treat us like people ,unlike playing otherbig games like cod where they just show they care about our money  . riot communicates to us and play with us like we are friends
not to mention so much more helpful when we have a problem
